ValidationRule.description: Force user to select the 'Continue to Signed' checkbox before changing stage to 'Contract Signed'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Contract Signed"), NOT(Continue_to_Signed__c), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name ,"Admin")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Finance Approver") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select the 'Continue to Signed' checkbox to move stage to 'Contract Signed'. Please note that by confirming Contract Signed the opportunity stage will be locked and may no longer be changed.
